title: Impact of Moringa oleifera leaf extract on renal histopathology, malondialdehyde, superoxide dismutase, and calcium oxalate crystals in rats (Rattus norvegicus) exposed to ethylene glycol.
abstract: Nephrolithiasis is a kidney disorder caused by the formation of crystals through physiological and chemical processes in the body, with calcium oxalate being a major contributor.Moringa oleiferaleaves are known for their antioxidant, diuretic, and anti-inflammatory properties and contain alkaloids, flavonoids, polyphenols, polysaccharides, saponins, phenolics, and tannins.
